text: Ed: #JoniErnst is "lying" by claiming President @BarackObama is holding up a #KeystoneXL "jobs bill" as she phrased it. #edshow #SOTU
author: edshow

text: Ed: "#JoniErnst did this commercial about castrating a pig. She's trying to put lipstick on a pig and its called Keystone." #edshow #SOTU
author: edshow

text: PBO #SOTU: "The Pentagon says that #climatechange poses immediate risks to our national security. We should act like it." #edshow
author: edshow

text: PBO #SOTU: "Our shift in Cuba policy has the potential to end a legacy of mistrust in our hemisphere." http://on.msnbc.com/1zvaL15  #edshow
author: edshow

text: Obama calls on Congress to pass "a resolution to authorize the use of force against #ISIL." http://on.msnbc.com/1zvaL15  #SOTU #edshow
author: edshow

text: #SOTU: "..but 95% of the world's customers live outside our borders, and we can't close ourselves off from those opportunities." #edshow
author: edshow

text: #SOTU: "Look, I'm the first one to admit that past trade deals haven't always lived up to the hype..." http://on.msnbc.com/1zvaL15  #edshow
author: edshow

text: #SOTU: "21st century businesses need 21st century infrastructure...so let's set our sights higher than a single oil pipeline." #edshow
author: edshow

text: PBO #SOTU: "I am sending this Congress a bold new plan to lower the cost of community college - to zero." http://on.msnbc.com/1zvaL15  #edshow
author: edshow

text: #SOTU "If you truly believe you could work full-time & support a family on less than $15K a year go try it." http://on.msnbc.com/1zvaL15  #edshow
author: edshow

author: edshow
